de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISAccount

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IControl, ISCommon, ISConnect

    public interface ISAccount
extends ISCommon
    Provides the API to manage the accounts that are obligatory objects to catch mails from mail servers.
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAccountAPI().store(con, account);
